ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a double crust 9-inch pie, 1 cup white sugar, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or more as needed,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg, 2 cups peeled, cored and sliced apples, 1 cup peeled, pitted and sliced peaches, 1 cup peeled, cored and sliced pears, 1 cup pitted and sliced plums, 1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger root, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 4g 19%, Sodium 235mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 58g 21%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 33g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 12mg 59%, Calcium 14mg 1%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 128mg 3%
